get.summary: Get card by its set and collector number.
get.description: This returns a card matching the provided set prefix and collector number combination.

parameters.description: The edition's collector number in the set it belongs to.
parameters.name: collector_number

parameters.description: The set's prefix as printed in the footer of its cards.
parameters.name: set_prefix

classes.description: The card's classes. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

editions.description: A list of all editions this card is a parent of.

items.description: The Edition type describes a specific release of its parent Card.

circulationTemplates.description: Templated prints of this edition which are shared with other editions of this or any other card.

circulations.description: Non-templated prints of this edition which are not shared with other editions of any other card.

collaborators.description: Collaborators that worked on the edition's artwork alongside the edition's illustrator.

collector_number.description: The edition's collector number in the set it belongs to.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

other_orientations.description: Other orientations related to this edition.

items.description: Other orientations that relate to this one. This will return the back face for editions with an `orientation` set to `"front"`, and vice versa.

classes.description: The card's classes. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

language.description: The language used by the dataset.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

prefix.description: The set's prefix as printed in the footer of its cards.

subtypes.description: The card's subtypes. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

types.description: The card's types. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

rarity.description: The edition's rarity. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

slug.description: The edition's URL-friendly slug. This is usually in the format `{card-slug}-{set-prefix}`, but can be extended if additional context is required.

language.description: The language used by the dataset.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

prefix.description: The set's prefix as printed in the footer of its cards.

element.description: The card's element. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

elements.description: The card's element(s). The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

referenced_by.description: References made to this card by other cards.

references.description: References this card makes to other cards.

result_editions.description: A list of all editions this card is a parent of which match the given query.

circulations.description: Non-templated prints of this edition which are not shared with other editions of any other card.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

get.description: This returns cards matching the provided query parameters.

parameters.description: Get cards with any `class` value included in this list.
parameters.name: class

parameters.description: Use this to adjust how cards are targeted by the `class` query parameter. `OR` includes any card which includes one or more of the `class` values, whilst `AND` only matches cards that include all of the specified `class` values.
parameters.name: class_logic

parameters.description: Include or exclude editions which have collaborators.
parameters.name: collab

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `collector_number` that exactly matches this string.
parameters.name: collector_number

parameters.description: Find cards using a specific configuration.
parameters.name: configuration

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `effect_raw` that is similar to this string.
parameters.name: edition_effect

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `flavor` that is similar to this string.
parameters.name: edition_flavor

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `last_update` date greater than this value.
parameters.name: edition_last_update

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `slug` that exactly matches this string.
parameters.name: edition_slug

parameters.description: Get a card with `effect_raw` or edition `effect_raw` that is similar to this string.
parameters.name: effect

parameters.description: Get cards with any `elements` value included in this list. `\"null\"` can be used to match cards with no element.
parameters.name: element

parameters.description: Use this to adjust how cards are targeted by the `element` query parameter. `OR` includes any card which includes one or more of the `elements` values, whilst `AND` only matches cards that include all of the specified `elements` values.
parameters.name: element_logic

parameters.description: Get a card with a `flavor` that is similar to this string.
parameters.name: flavor

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `illustrator` that exactly matches this string. `"null"` can be used to match cards with no illustrator.
parameters.name: illustrator

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's set's `language` that exactly matches this string.
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Get a card with a `last_update` date greater than this value.
parameters.name: last_update

parameters.description: Used in parallel with `legality_limit`, specify which game format to target.
parameters.name: legality_format

parameters.description: Used in parallel with `legality_format`, specify an exact card limit.
parameters.name: legality_limit

parameters.description:
Used in parallel with `legality_format`, specify whether a card is legal or restricted.
This is ignored if `legality_limit` is specified.
parameters.name: legality_state

parameters.description: Get a card with a `name` that is similar to this string.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Specify the order to return the matching results in.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Move to a specific `page` of results.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Specify how many results to include per page.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Get a cards with any edition's set's `prefix` included in this list.
parameters.name: prefix

parameters.description: Get a card with an edition's `rarity` that exactly matches this number.
parameters.name: rarity

parameters.description: Get a card with a `rule` whose `title` or `description` contains this case-insensitive string.
parameters.name: rule

parameters.description: Get a card with a `rule` whose `title` exactly matches this case-insensitive string. `"null"` can be used to match cards with rules that have no title.
parameters.name: rule_title

parameters.description: Split each `result_edition` into its own dedicated `data` entry. By default all editions shared by cards of the same name are grouped together, however it may be more desirable in some cases to split these editions into their own results.
parameters.name: separate_editions

parameters.description: Get a card with a `slug` that exactly matches this string.
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Get a card by its speed stat.
parameters.name: speed

parameters.description: Get a card whose numeric stats are contained within a semicolon-delimited list of values.
parameters.name: stats

parameters.description: Specify the primary card or edition field the results are sorted by.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Get cards with any `subtype` value included in this list.
parameters.name: subtype

parameters.description: Use this to adjust how cards are targeted by the `subtype` query parameter. `OR` includes any card which includes one or more of the `subtype` values, whilst `AND` only matches cards that include all of the specified `subtype` values.
parameters.name: subtype_logic

parameters.description: Get cards with any `type` value included in this list.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Use this to adjust how cards are targeted by the `type` query parameter. `OR` includes any card which includes one or more of the `type` values, whilst `AND` only matches cards that include all of the specified `type` values.
parameters.name: type_logic

has_more.description: Are there more pages beyond this one with results?

order.description: The order the results are returned.

page_size.description: The maximum number of results returned per page.

paginated_cards_count.description: The number of cards returned on this page.

sort.description: The primary field the results are sorted by.

total_cards.description: The total result count across all pages.

get.description: This returns a list of API update changelog entries ordered by descending date.

parameters.description: Number of results to display.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: A list of changelog entries ordered by descending date.

schema.description: A list of changelog entries ordered by descending date.

content.description: A HTML description of the update with Index-specific links.
content.example: Added new set: Alchemical Revolution First Edition.

get.description: This returns a featured set group's logo image.

parameters.description: The filename to download.
parameters.name: filename

get.description: This returns a list of featured set groups and the sets they contain.

200.description: A list of featured set groups.

schema.description: A list of featured set groups.

name.description: The name of the featured set group.

sets.description: The sets which belong to the featured set group.

language.description: The language used by the dataset.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

prefix.description: The set's prefix as printed in the footer of its cards.

get.description: This returns public decklist data for the event (if available).

get.summary: Get judges in an Omnidex event.
get.description: This returns a list of judges in the event.
This returns pairings for an event. By default it returns the latest stage and round.

parameters.description: A round ID.
parameters.name: round

parameters.description: A stage ID.
parameters.name: stage

get.summary: Get players in an Omnidex event.
get.description: This returns a list of players participating in the event.

get.summary: Get basic information about a round in an Omnidex event.
get.description: This returns basic info about a round in an Omnidex event. If no stage or round is specified, it returns the latest stage and round respectively.

parameters.description: A round ID.
parameters.name: round

parameters.description: A stage ID.
parameters.name: stage

200.description: The matching event's basic round and stage info.

schema.description: The matching event's basic round and stage info.

get.description: This returns an Omnidex event matching the provided ID.
This returns Swiss stage standings for the event.

get.summary: Get statistics for an Omnidex event.
get.description: This returns public statistics data for an Omnidex event (if available).

get.summary: Get teams in an Omnidex event.
get.description: This returns a list of teams participating in the event (if applicable).

get.summary: Get lists of terms which are commonly used throughout the API.

parameters.description: Select a specific option rather than including all of them.
parameters.name: field

200.description: A list of featured set groups.

schema.description: A list of featured set groups.

foil.description: Are cards printed with this circulation foil?

text.description: A human-friendly version of the circulation value.

value.description: The circulation type (this matches `kind` values found on `Circulation` and `CirculationTemplate` responses).

circulationPopulationOperator.description: Circulation population operators used by `Circulation` and `CirculationTemplate` responses.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the circulation population operator value.
A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.

orientations.description: A list of matching `configurationOrientation` values this configuration uses.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the configuration value.
A human-friendly version of the configuration orientation value.

value.description: The orientation of the game configuration.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.

language.description: Card set languages.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.
A stringified version of the rarity numbers associated with card editions.

display.description: The set's display name. This usually matches the `text` value, but sometimes contains a shortened version instead.

text.example: Ive been recruited as a champion to save the world but suddenly got transported to modern Earth!

group.description: The group the stat belongs to.

statOperator.description: Operators that can be used when searching for cards by their numeric stat values.

for.description: The value keys this stat operator specifically targets.

input.description:
Does this stat operator require additional input?
A missing value is truthy - this property only applies if the value explicitly returns `false`.

text.description: A human-friendly description of the operator.
A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.

text.description: A human-friendly version of the value.

value.description: A value referenced or returned elsewhere by the API.

commit_hash.description: The git commit hash the API is running on.

db.description: The database the API is pulling data from.

deploy_hash.description: The deployment hash the API is running on.

message.description: A brief description of the API.

request_received.description: The time the request was received by the server.

CardCostMemory.description:
The card's memory cost (`cost_reserve` will be `null` if this is numeric).
Be aware that cards can have both memory and reserve cost set to `null` (example: Shifting Currents).

CardCostReserve.description:
The card's reserve cost (`cost_memory` will be `null` if this is numeric).
`-1` represents a card with "X" cost (example: Lost in Thought).
Be aware that cards can have both memory and reserve cost set to `null` (example: Shifting Currents).

population.description: The quantity of editions printed with this circulation.

population_operator.description: A symbol to describe the accuracy of the population. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

printing.description: Is this circulation still in print?

CirculationVariant.description: Circulation variants describe print variations within specific Circulation and CirculationTemplate types. This is mainly used to describe stamp variants.

population.description: The quantity of editions printed with this circulation.

population_operator.description: A symbol to describe the accuracy of the population. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

printing.description: Is this circulation still in print?

description.description: A short description of the variant.

last_update.description: When the dataset was last updated.

Circulation.description: The Circulation type describes the print of its parent Edition.

population.description: The quantity of editions printed with this circulation.

population_operator.description: A symbol to describe the accuracy of the population. The possible values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.

printing.description: Is this circulation still in print?

EditionConfiguration.description: The edition's play configuration. The `"flip"` response is given on editions which are double-faced.

EditionEffect.description: The edition's specific effect. This is only populated if the value differs from the parent `Card`'s `effect` value.

EditionEffectHTML.description: The edition's specific raw effect. This is `null` if the edition's `effect` value is `null`.

EditionEffectRaw.description: The edition's specific raw effect. This is `null` if the edition's `effect` value is `null`.

EditionFlavor.description: The edition's specific flavor text. This is only populated if the value differs from the parent `Card`'s `flavor` value.
EditionFlavor.example: The centerpiece of the Imperial Armory.

EditionOrientation.description: The edition's orientation. This is set to `"front"` or `"back"` if the edition's `configuration` is `"flip"`, otherwise it will be `null`.

EditionThemaScore.description: One of the edition's Thema score values.

EditionThemaScoreTotal.description: The sum of a range of edition Thema score values.

CardEffectTemplate.description: The card's effect as a template.
CardEffectTemplate.example: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER]. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)*

CardEffectHTML.description: The card's effect as HTML. This is `null` if the card's `effect` value is `null`.
CardEffectHTML.example: Class Bonus Level 2+ Crescent Glaive gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)

CardEffectRaw.description: The card's effect as plain text. This is `null` if the card's `effect` value is `null`.
CardEffectRaw.example: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Crescent Glaive gets +1 POWER. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)

CardFlavor.example: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

CardStatSpeed.description: The card's speed stat. `true` represents Fast whilst `false` represents Slow.

CardLegality.description: Legality limits the card is subject to. This is only populated if the card is limited in certain formats. The possible game format values are revealed by the `option/search` endpoint.
